sprint_goal: Establish cloud infrastructure and secure authentication framework for all user roles.
epic_coverage: Cloud Infrastructure, Core Backend, Mobile, Web
key_deliverables: AKS Cluster with Terraform; Auth Module with RBAC; Mobile Local DB Schema; Web Map Component
demo_objectives: Show AKS cluster active; Demo protected API endpoint (401/403); Show basic Map rendering; Show Local DB init.
success_criteria: Infrastructure deployed to Dev; Auth module validates B2C tokens; Mobile local storage operational.
risk_factors: Azure quota limits; B2C configuration delays.
mitigation_strategies: Request quota early; Use mock tokens if B2C delays occur.

sprint_goal: Enable real-time communication infrastructure and admin geospatial tools.
epic_coverage: Core Backend, Web Portals, Mobile, Infrastructure
key_deliverables: WebSocket Gateway (Secured); Admin Map Drawing Tools; Mobile Offline Queue Logic; SecOps Validation
demo_objectives: WebSocket connection with auth; Drawing a service area on map; Offline queue persisting requests.
success_criteria: WebSocket handshake works; Valid GeoJSON exported from map; Infrastructure passes security scan.
risk_factors: WebSocket scaling on Azure; Mapbox validation edge cases.
mitigation_strategies: Early load test with Redis adapter; Extensive geometry unit tests.

sprint_goal: Finalize mobile field capabilities including OCR and sync, and validate performance.
key_deliverables: Mobile OCR Flow; Offline Sync Processor; Location Broadcasting; Map Accessibility
demo_objectives: Scan invoice with camera; Sync offline requests; Track tech location; Accessible map navigation.
success_criteria: OCR populates form; Sync recovers from failure; Map is keyboard accessible; Performance SLAs met.
risk_factors: OCR accuracy; Sync conflicts; Map accessibility complexity.
mitigation_strategies: Allow manual override for OCR; Strict FIFO queue; Use text fallbacks for map a11y.
